11.title: Tooth Devision round one

choices: Lightning offensive.
Cautious defensive.
111.content:
You bask in the bright lights that shine down on you and your opponent. No matter how many times you do it, stepping into those lights makes you feel invigorated. There is a little time to play to the crowd. Chances are that most of them expect you to lose. That does not matter though. It is always more fun to surprise the crowd and it makes the experience a lot more entertaining for them as well. Your opponent may have a few feet on you and his girth shows he is very successful, but there is no doubt in your mind that you will win this fight.

After playing to the crowd you take a much closer look at your opponent. He is almost your opposite as far as fighters go. Your well toned muscles are those of a quick and lethal predator while your opponent has the fat and slow, yet extremely muscular, body of someone that is used to using sheer overwhelming power. By the way your opponent is licking his lips you can tell he expects you to make him just a little fatter and slower. To you, the fat body looks absolutely delicious. It will make for a nice meal to start out this tournament. You will probably need the extra nutrients later on.

The cage begins to lower. It looks heavy enough to keep either of you from escaping. There are long spikes all over the cage and you would be surprised if it was not electrified as well. No escape, that is perfectly fine with you. A few opponents in your past have managed to escape through the crowd and it is nice to know you did not have to worry about that here. It is time to concentrate on the opponent before you now. The bell will be ringing soon and you doubt he will hold back while you admire the cage.

You still need to come up with a strategy to beet the stegosaur before you. He did not get that big by being stupid and careless. There are a couple of ways you could go about this. You could go on the offensive immediately and use your overwhelming speed to finish this match quickly. It might be a good idea to stay on the defensive though. You should be able to avoid anything he can throw at you and tire him out. That way he would struggle less as he slide down your throat and all those spikes would be a little less uncomfortable as you added his own girth to your own.
111.title: Speed VS Power

choices: Latch onto the side of the Stego and Press your attack
Play as the Stego...
1111.content:
Being cautious might work if you were in a better posiition to wait out the foe. He probally will be all to happy to use the slow and steady method, ending with you squirming in his midrift. Your strength is in speed,first strike, maim him and keep on it till you have won. You wait a moment for him to inhale, then time your attack for when there is the least air in his lungs


You move in quickly, Ducking low to avoid the Stegos first move, you swing around to Grab its left arm with your jaws, its fat but you can get your lips around it, you slide both your hind legs into position and kick his middle hard. Then add a quick double kick to his chest, staggering him. Carefullly avoiding his plates and spikes you continue to soften him up

The beast is already a few seconds behind you. Your kicks to his stomach make it wobble.. Your forclaws grab its head and start to wrench, continuing a frenzied assault. Even as you grapple you start tot taste that meaty armflesh, your tongue rubbing against it again and again, moaning at the pleasure.. The sweet hide just makes your drool run more and more. perhaps you should do hit and runs.. but if you keep attacking you can trip him up.... You add a strong one two set of kicks to his knee, scoring telling blows, the feel of bone under the fat is quite obvious.
1111.title: Speed kills..Will it feed?.

choices: Flop over on the Raptor and crush him under your girth.
grab his head with your spare hand and tear him off.. and then
11112.content:
You grunt in pain, the raptor was to fast, it grabbed you and seems to be trying to eat you a bit at a time. You swing your body, trying to use your momentum to get him off but hes lodged in there, grappling and chewing, trying to get through your protective hide and fat.

The Raptor readjusts its bite, trying to get closer to your vitals,Its drool runs down your body as you feel its attacks, though its hitting you hard your layer of fat protects and cushions you far more than he knows. nothing crucial yet, all an all its not a smart speed demon. A few missed kicks and you manage to catch a calf in the assaulted side, making him yelp, in surprise.. you might not be fast overall, but you closed your hand nice and firm.

Taking a deep breath you flex your muscles and decide its time to teach him a lesson in Stego style Combat. Its close, brutal, and always won by the bigger man.
11112.title: Staggered, but not out

choices: Lay on his back, Yank his ankle back, twisting hard , shove your plates into him
Put your arms behind his head in a headlock.. and rape him
111121.content:
Having the leg hold on the frantic raptor you fall to your side. The raptor can't get away with you holding on though. The sudden shift of position, your torso and shoulders slamming into his body pinning him to the floor, forces air from his lungs removing the bite from your underarm. You quickly pin the head down, keeping its eyes looking away. You don;t want it to see what its doing after all..
,

The crowd cheers in pure bliss at the surprise, a big boy isn't well liked till they start to win, your not flashy, but the crowd gets the idea that an initial offense can easily lead to an offensive gurgle from a sated gut. You feel the raptor struggling for breath under you, squirming to get out. Still holding his foot you are at liberty to try your nest move
111121.title: A weight to much for raptor to bear

choices: Switch to the raptor.
Attempt to grab the raptor while he attacks.
1111212.content:
You wrap your arms around his head. This will definitely be something fun to do before you add him to your girth. It will probably wear him out so he will not try to claw your throat on the way down. The poor little guy never really stood a chance you laugh to yourself and lick your lips in anticipation.

You are about to penetrate the raptor when he starts chuckling. That seems weird for somebody in his situation. Then he says, “You leaf eaters are all the same, all brawn and no brains. What do you think your dealing with, another one of your smooth footed companions?”

You feel something pointy against your leg. Crap, you had forgotten about those lethal feet of his. He had kicked you a few times, but it was his head he had been using as his primary weapon. Now you had left your own leg open to a vicious attack from his free foot and the raptor was taking advantage of your carelessness.

There is a loud ripping sound as the raptor’s claw tries to tear up your hamstrings. You roll off of him before he can completely cripple one side of your body. The cut was still bad. Not bleed to death bad, but you were definitely going to be even slower on your feet than before. That was not much of a disadvantage though. Your back was well protected and he would have to come at you from the sides or come in for a head on attack. The little raptor would also have to do a lot more damage to you than you would to him in order to take him down. It would only be a matter of time before he made a mistake and you got your hands on him once more. And your arms were perfectly fine.

The raptor is charging, jaws agape. You ready yourself to counter his charge.
1111212.title: Retractable Claw

choices: Finish him.
The stegosaur is feigning injury.
11112121.content:
You were hoping that he would concentrate on your head once again. Sure enough, that is just what he does. The stegosaur tries to get anther headlock on you, but when you are within inches of him your jaws snap closed and you go for another kick to his injured leg. You really dig in with your claws and he cries out in pain. Then you dart back from him just before he can take your head off with his fist.

The stegosaur is now clearly unstable on that leg. That should make it a lot easier for you to get off as many hit and run attacks as you want. You would not want to get in his grip again. It would not be good if he tried to rape you in the middle of the ring once more. You are not really afraid of being raped, it is just that you have a little surprise for those that try to have sex you and want to keep it a secret until you encounter some of the larger opponents in this tournament.

“Aw, what’s the matter? Does the big bad herbivore have a little trouble walking on that delicious looking leg?” You figure taunting will help make him a little sloppy. The crowd is also cheering. It seems that it has once again become a match of the little guy overcoming all odds to beat his monstrous opponent. He might have the strength of an enraged opponent, but you are already faster than he is and you should be able to dodge him even better if he does not put much thought behind his attacks. The stegosaur snorts and you think you have his attention.

You sprint back in and he looks a little better prepared for an attack to his legs, which is why you go for the arm you bit before. This time you just bite down and try to swing your head back and forth to tear up the arm before backing up immediately. You are not going to make the mistake of enjoying his flavor while he still has a free arm to grab you with. That had been a stupid mistake and it had been embarrassing to get caught by the stegosaur that way. Your raptor ancestors would be ashamed. There will be plenty of time to enjoy his flavor once you have him sliding down your throat.

By the way his arm looks; you might have actually hit something vital this time. His arm is hanging limply and now he only has one good leg and one good arm. You lick your lips, sensing a kill. This might be over faster than you had thought it would be. “Did that hurt? Don’t worry; I’m sure all the pain will go away after I’ve digest you.”
11112121.title: Hit And Run

choices: Eat, uh, meet and greet a few fans.
Go and digest your meal.
111121211.content:
He may be strong, but he cannot beat you with only one arm. You play to the crowd a little bit since the stegosaur is not going to be having any sudden bursts of speed. The crowd loves it too. None of them want the match to be over too soon anyways. They want to get their moneys worth out of these fights.

You go in and delver a kick here, a bit there, and the occasional claw rake to the stegosaur. The attacks do not do much damage, but the crowd has fun watching you do them while the stegosaur tries to grab you. All of these attacks do serve to tire the stegosaur down as he continues to make angry, but sloppy, swings at you. It eventually becomes so easy to dodge him that you are letting him come within inches of getting you before pulling away from him.

You go in for one more kick to his leg. Right after you do so, you are taken by surprise as he attempts to lay on you. There is just enough time to dance backwards before his immense weight flattens you. That was a lot closer than you would like the crowd to think. Then you notice the stegosaur is not getting back up. He had not done that on purpose. He had just fallen over and he did not look like he could get back up. Beating up on a standing opponent was one thing, but the crowd would turn on him if he tormented someone who could not even stand up.

You walk up to your fallen opponent. He makes one more weak attempt to attack you with his good arm. You just grab his arm and shove it in your mouth. He tries to shake his arm out of your mouth, but he is too weak to do that anymore. You swallow his arm all the way up to his shoulder. Then your jaw starts to expand as you take his head and chest into your mouth. Now is the time to savor your opponent, before you have to deal with those spikes. Whatever the stegosaur has been eating has made for excellent seasoning. This is one of the best stegosaurs you have ever eaten. In fact, he tastes so good that you do not even notice when the spikes hit your throat. The meal is just so delicious nothing else matters. Your mouth and throat expand impossibly as you try to force a meal larger than you are into your belly. Even the sounds of the roaring crowd do not register with you as you enjoy your victory. All that is left of the stegosaur that is outside of you is his spiked tail. It tries to use it to whack you in the side of the head in one more futile effort to defeat you and escape. You had been anticipating that and caught his tail with your hands. A few more gulps and you had slurped the tail down as well.

You only wish the stegosaur had been a little bigger. It is a little sad that the meal has to over so soon. You let out a satisfied belch and take a good look at yourself. It looks like you have grown in more ways than one. You are a couple feet taller than you had been and your belly still drags pleasantly against the floor. As you lick your chops to and rub your belly happily with both hands as you let out another belch as you wait for the cage to rise so you can get out and the next match can begin. This is a good way to start this tournament out.
111121211.title: Food Chain

choices: stay as raptor
The boys pov
1111212111.content:
After you have left the ring and the tribune, some ambulance men comes.
"We must check your healthiness, please come with us" on of the ambulance men say.
They admistrate you a long, complicated way to the clinic.
An half an hour later arrive you the clinic. "Why is the way to the clinic so long? Why you haven´t built the clinic by the exit?" you ask a little angry.
"Err... you must ask the architect. We aren´t responsible for the construction" an other ambulance man say confused. "Now we will check your healthiness, please lie down on the operation table" he add.
So you lie down and they clamp some electrodes in your face and on your chest.
"pulsebeat is solid" one man say.
"Its almost done, we only give you an injection" the doctor say and take a syringe. "It won´t hurt" he say and injects a clear fluid.
After some minutes the doctor say: "Its done. You can go back your changing room"
So you go out the clinic and try to find back the way you had taken. "What stupid guys! Why they have built the clinic so far away?" you talk to yourself after some ineffective tryings to find back.
One hour later you are back the exit. "Phew! Now I want to have a rest" you say exhausted and open the door. Then you see a teen is standing in your changing room and smiles excited.
"What are you doing here?" you ask suprised.
"Its so a glory for me to meet you!" the stutter.
"When you want a autograph, you have bad luck because I can´t write" you say a little nerved.
"No, I don´t want an autograph. I want to be a wrestler like you and I wanted to know if you, err..., can train with me?" the boy ask shyly.
"You want to train with a dinosaur?" you ask dumbfounded.
"Yes, I really want. Its my dream to become a popular wrestler" he answer excited.
"Ok, I can train with you, but we must make it more realistic" you say
"How?" he ask astonished
"Do you have a costum?"
"No, I always wrestled in my shorts" he say
"Ok, then make you ready"
"Yes, we can start" he say unsure
"Because you are the learner, you can attack me and I will avoid"
Then the teenager run to you and try to punch you, but you jump away easily. He quickly turn around and try to kick you. You avoid every attack of him. "You must be faster" you say.
"I try, but you too fast for me" he answer enervated. The teen kick and punch but never score a hit.
After many ineffective beats you say: "Now its my turn! You must try to avoid"
You smile snaky.
Then you kick him. He jump away, but it was scant. "Hey, good!" you compliment him.
"Thanks" he say very happy.
During he talk, you kick his belly so hard, that he fall backwards. He gasp, but you put your feet on his belly. "You lose" you simply say.
"Ok, let me stand up, please" he say.
"I can´t" you say with a viciously smile.
"Why not?" he ask a bit scared.
"Haven´t you read the rules? I´m the winer and you are the loser. You know what will happen when you will lose." you say.
"But I´m no member by this tournament" he say shocked.
"You fought against me and then you are a member" you answer.
"Please..." he cry but you ignore his please and you bend forward. You open your mouth and...
1111212111.title: foolish fan

choices: next match
11112121111.content:
You bend forwards and look in his with fear filled face. A little saliva drop from your jaw and land on his bare chest. He try to disengage him and try to push your feet with his free hand away. But its useless, you are to strong for him.
He cry muted whereupon you predominant laugh. "You cowardly worm! Stop crying and comply your fortune" you say scoffing. Thereupon he cry louder. "Why me? You have eaten a whole dinosaur. Why me too?" he snivel tearstained. "I always could bear a little snack... and you have the right size" you answer conniving. Now flow more saliva out of your mouth and you lick it with your tongue away. You try to solace the boy by you say to him: "That is not so bad... you won´t feel the digesting acids. You will be quasi a part of me"
Now you bend more forwards. You are really close to his face with your mouth. You open it wide and lick his face. You close your eyes for enjoyment. "Human tastes sooo good... and its really funny to eat them alive" you say. You laugh and devour his head. Your prey shout and struggle, but it only come a muted sound out.
You tear at his head and you work you slowly to his shoulders
You set your foot back on the ground and elevate you head. The boy kick in the air and try to free himself out of his cramped prison, but by every kick slides he deeper in your mouth.
When you have reached his belly, you bring your head in a straight position. More saliva runs out your mouth. You lick his belly and enjoy his flavor. "You taste so good.. and send the stego my regard" you say and must laugh. Now you elevate your head again and the boy slide deeper in your stomach. The bulge in your belly becomes bigger the more the boy disapear in your gullet.
The boy struggle and struggle, but he can´t arrange against your avarice.
When you have reached his legs, it become faster. You lick him a last time before you swallow him whole.
You feel how his feet slide down your gullet und hum jubilant.
You sit down at the ground and rub against your with a dinosaur and a human filled belly. You burp loud and feel how the escape attempts of the ugly boy attenuate.
Some minutes later you go to your room and lay in your bed. You rub your belly one more time and fall asleep
11112121111.title: Living Meal

choices: It is a employee of the tournament.
It is the female wanting to talk.
111121211111.content:
*A loud knock is at the door that startles the green dinosaur awake. You give a sigh of annoyance upon realizing that the dream of being the center of attention in a harem of beautiful females was just and probably only be a dream. Stretching your scaled arms above your head you yell out to whoever is on the other side.*
"If you have keys to this place then come in. If I did not give you keys then give me another hour of rest."

*You know that there is only a few people with a key that would dare wake the victor of the last match. It is either a worker from the tournament to give you news on the next match or the female who introduced you to this fighting league that you gave a spare key to.*
111121211111.title: Rude awakening.

choices: was a poor raptor looking for a way to get fame.
was a rich dino who just had perverted fantasies of eating others.
1111212111112.content:
*Finally getting out of bed your green scaled belly sloshes back and forth noisily. Giving your gut a firm poke you can judge that most of the stego and human snack are mush but not ready to come out yet. The door swings open revealing it to be Ananda the one responsible for you being here. As she gets into full view you are able to gaze at her body that you have not seen for several weeks. She is a fellow raptor but has tan scales a little taller then you and has a little bit of chub around her belly.*
"Hello Ananda, what brings you here? Last I recall you said I should not make it to the big leagues and here I am with one win already."

*She groans as you jiggle your belly to show off the last challenger. After you are done teasing her she replies with a smirk.*
"I said you should not try going into the big league since you are not ready yet. The smaller matches when I was training you, you almost lost half of your matches and it seems that only luck was on your side. Yesterday I saw your first match and was surprised that you went against my judgement on your skills. Don't you remember how this all started in the first place?"

*You sit down on the bed and continue to rub your squishy belly while responding.*
"Of course I know how this all started. Years ago when I had nothing to do YOU asked me who at the time was a..."
1111212111112.title: Why did she come?

choices: Make fun of him, embarrass you're meal before eating it.
Kick him around alittle more...People DID pay to see this.
11112122.content:
You're opponent thinks you are now nothing but a helpless vegetarian with a sore bleeding leg, but he is wrong, while it may seem that you simply rely on brute strength you use you're own body fat in you're strategy...You still have afew more tricks up you're armored hide.

He's charging at you looking ready to simply swallow you right then and there since of you're attempt to rape him, he's not taking chances anymore. His comment on how burly "leaf eaters" like you're self all fight the same way, thats odd coming from someone from a species that has will not change their strategy of attack; hit and run. To you this is no warriors way of fighting. You come up with a plan, it's risky due to chance but if this doesn't work you might not have time to think of another one before he gets you in his mouth.

He's making a full on charge at you seeming to be targeting a spot you wouldn't expect or be able to counter in time. You get you're defenses up with both you're arms held strongly in front of you, he stops three feet ahead of you and drats around you to try and naw at the side of you're belly...Just as you expected.

"Fatal mistake!" you say with fury in you're booming voice, and swing as hard as you can with you're spiked tail. The next thing you here is a bloody smack as like as if a hammer swung down hard and hitting tough meat. The crowd gasps then roars in excitement, you look at you're foe laying half broken on the muddy ground bleeding from his right shoulder and his thigh...You can see his shoulder and thigh was impaled by the spikes on you're tail, he's squirming in pain, in so much pain he can't even scream but instead has a face of pure shock. You're thinking that he's trying to figure out what went wrong.

You feel sorry for him, but then you're belly churns and reminds you why you're here, to eat those that make the foolish mistake of doubting you're power. So what shall you do?
11112122.title: Attempt to grab the raptor while he attacks.

choices: Fast quick swallows .
Slow and easy gulps.
111121221.content:
While you did feel sorry for him for a moment, your cruel side arises as you remember at how he taunted you for being as fat as you are. Being fat is natural for your race but none the less you still hate it intensely when others poke fun at you for it.

You figure that since he'd be hardly any trouble to gulp down in his beat up state you might as well give him something to remember in his final moments of the outside world.

"Whats the matter? Don't have it in you to get knocked down again?" you say with a smirk. He mumbles something foul and strains to get back on his feet but his wounds prevent him from doing so, he makes it to one knee though.

"I wouldn't do that if I were you, you might bleed to death before I can enjoy breaking your pride into little pieces and eating them." You laugh at his sad attempts to fight back and watch him snarl furiously at you. You decide it's enough taunting for now, you've delayed your stomachs will for too long and the crowd is getting impatient.

So how will you finish your meal?
111121221.title: Pfft...THAT was your best?

choices: You get visitors...Most likely fans.
Switch to the Raptor.
1111212211.content:
You're not in the mood to take this slowly, you hungry now.

You slowly walk over to you're defeated meal and rub you're stomach in impatience, the way he bleeds makes you thirsty, you imagine how it would feel going down you're throat.

He's stretched out on the ground breathing heavily with half of his body covered in his own blood due to struggling to get back into the fight but that only widened his wounds.

You stand over him looking down at him as he stares back up at you narrowing his eyes because of the pain his wounds are causing him. "It hurts alot, right? Don't worry...It won't hurt for much longer." and with that you pick him up with one hand and stick his head in your mouth, he struggles weakly but this isn't even noticeable to you, you continue to slurp his body up like a noodle. A bulge is visible in your throat, you can feel him start to move into your stomach as his legs inter your throat.

He suddenly starts to kick around, you wonder why as he's pretty much gone anyway, struggling at this point is pretty pointless. You make one last hard swallow, and he plops in your stomach completely. It's sort of difficult to tell if you even eat something as large as him, you would really have to look closely to see his bulge through your girth. You wave to the cheering crowd as belch with gusto, your meal is rather quite now despite the digestive process not beginning yet.

They rise the spiked gate and lead you back to the relaxation area while talking to you about your victory.
1111212211.title: Through the teeth and past the gums.

choices: Play the two Headed game...
Pick up a sharp Piece of steel to use as a spear... equalizer?
112.content:
Your a muscular beast, standing almost ten feet tall.. well more like 9 but you claim it to the smaller foes before you eat them. You have tons of natural talent, a eating and fighting machine. Limber and flexible you stretch as your the first in the arena.. its done up like the ruins of a city.. countless objects to hide behind, tons of dangerous pointy objects



The foe... this is.. interesting, he's a big boy, hes blue, and covered with hard scales and chitinous plates, furthermore he has two heads and two tails, all looking hungry, It shows countless scars of battle.. its a bit pudgy and standing at 7'11..The Warrior smiles, unarmed, you realize that both heads are independent... its like fighting two at once.. this isn't going to be easy.. on The other hand.. they might argue....

You decide to wait, your not going to give away your abilities to soon, and if you keep your eye on this dragon you probably have speed over that armor... on the otherhand.. a bit of range could help feel it out.. well your life will be decided here, a old champ or you the new one...
112.title: 2 headed dragon Vs Anthro Gator

choices: Switch to the two headed dragon's perspective
Continue as the gator
1121.content:
You decide to see if you can play the dragon's two heads against each other. If you can get them to argue you can gain the advantage.

"Hey I've never seen a two headed dragon before so I'm curious about something. Which one of you is the smartest?" You ask the dragon's two heads. The eyes on the dragon's two heads blink in confusion at the sudden question and look at each other for a second.

"Why my brother is!" The head on the right replies in a thick British accent.

"Why thank you old chap." The head on the left responds in a British accent as well. "But I'm certain that it is you who is the smartest."

'Well that didn't work.' You think to yourself as the two dragon heads continue to compliment each other's intelligence. You need to think of a different question if you want to get the two heads to argue.
1121.title: A Two Headed British Dragon

info.brief_description: A fighting Championship where the losers are devoured by the winners. Prehistoric Entrants
info.description:
Its time for another round of eat or be eaten!
So whats different about this?
The winners of this competition will Be made into full characters at some point by me, The loosers.. well there part of the winners body for all eternity. Its a cutthroat competition till the last four or so...it allows people to help mold and design new gladiators that might appear in other places. . The skill of the writers will dictate who wins the matches if everything goes well.. root for your favroties, devoure the loosers
PLEASE post with some length, and just as important, play fair. Develop the characters if possible too


*Matches will be set up by the Author, when someone is devoured let the winner go on. So please leave the following fight setups to me. Feel free to taunt, enjoy the victory and digest, just will set up the next matches myself.
